name: Gancho Carrito
description:
We present you Gancho Carrito, a small game made by a group of buddies, many of us are first time developers for the Miz Jam 1 (https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1). This is our first project/jam together.

Gancho Carrito is a game about a lonely miner that is trying to escape a mine that is collapsing. Your job is to use your pickaxe tied by a rope to move your cart, and avoid obstacles while grabbing as much shinnies as you can. Reach the exit of the mine and survive! Or die trying...

How many coins and diamonds can you collect? Will you be able to reach 200?

We are proud of what we made, and excited to show you our game!

Made by:

Abi, Alix, Julián, Leonardo, Martín, Marzo and Peter
